definition: pit with funerary figures/pit containing terracotta warriors
wooden figures buried with the dead

sentences.english: Altogether, three such pits have been found.
sentences.chinese: 在這裏發現了三處秦俑坑呢。

sentences.english: What we can see so far are three pits.
sentences.chinese: 目前我們看到的有三個俑坑。
